# copy()

**Instance Method**

Returns a copy of the calling bounding region.

## Declaration

```swift
copy(): BoundingRegion;
```

## Return Value

A [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/BoundingRegion] that is a copy of the calling bounding region.

## Copying and converting regions

- **toCoordinateRegion()**: Returns the coordinate region that corresponds to the calling bounding region.

items.description: Returns the coordinate region that corresponds to the calling bounding region.
items.name: toCoordinateRegion()
